content: you will receive a pdf file with step-by-step instructions on how to make the paine headband available as an instant download sizes toddler child and adult skill level beginner the pattern uses standard american terms yarn 1 skein of category 6 super bulky yarn this headband uses a very nice and simple crochet stitch to create a chunky ribbed look it s then twisted in the front to close - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - please note that all of these patterns can be found for free with ads on my blog here http //www cjdesignblog com/ - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - returns/refunds there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - i would love to see your finished products
